Some players of my two latest games (The Piskie, placed August 2013, and Mermaid Bay, placed March 2014) have begun reporting problems with the games freezing up and losing the text box. I'm not certain, but it seems as if, in each case, this happens just before encountering a sound file. These games both worked perfectly prior to late March.
Both these games were written with Quest v.5.4
Might this be a compatability problem with v.5.5? Have there been any other reports of similar effects?
